title: Public Transport for the St Kilda Festival: Saturday 15 and Sunday 16 February 2025
articleContent:
We’re running extra tram services on Sunday to get you to and from the festival

With large crowds expected, public transport is the easiest way to get to and from the St Kilda Festival, with extra trams running between St Kilda and the city on Sunday 16 February.

Before you travel

  • Use the Journey Planner to plan your trip
  • Getting to and from the St Kilda Festival
  • Check train, tram and bus disruptions that may affect your journey
  • Check road closures during the festival
